entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
